title: Chicken Provencal
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons plain flour', 'salt and pepper', '8 chicken thighs, skin and bone removed', 'olive oil', '1 knob butter', '2 onions, chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 1/2 large wineglasses dry sherry', '6 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 tablespoon chopped parsley to decorate (optional)', '1 tablespoon pitted black olives to decorate (optional)']
